oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of an infection bioassay to study the interaction between carrots and Mycocentrospora acerina
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LOUARN, Sébastien
JENSEN, Dan Funck
Knudsen, Inge M.B.
Collinge, David B.
Jensen, Birgit
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Crop health, quality, protection
Post harvest management and techniques
Root crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper describes the development of a infection bioassay to study the interaction between the fungal pathogen Mycocentrospora acerina and carrots.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: LOUARN, Sébastien; JENSEN, Dan Funck; Knudsen, Inge M.B.; Collinge, David B. and Jensen, Birgit (2011) Development of an infection bioassay to study the interaction between carrots and Mycocentrospora acerina. Working paper. [Completed]
